original_text: “And to the angel of the church in Thyatira write: ‘The words of the Son of God, who has eyes like a flame of fire, and whose feet are like burnished bronze.
korean_text: 두아디라 교회의 사자에게 편지하라 그 눈이 불꽃 같고 그 발이 빛난 주석과 같은 하나님의 아들이 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And to the angel of the church in Thyatira write:
The words of the Son of God,
who has eyes like a flame of fire,
and whose feet are like burnished bronze.
